name: clair-local-scan
run_command: docker run -d --name clair-db arminc/clair-db:latest && docker run -p 6060:6060 --link clair-db:postgres -d --name clair arminc/clair-local-scan:v2.0.8_fe9b059d930314b54c78f75afe265955faf4fdc1
description: Clair is an open source project for the [static analysis] of vulnerabilities in application containers
